text: If you haven ’ t tuned into Jada Pinkett Smith ‘ s gem of a show Red Table Talk, you ’ re missing some powerful TV. The Facebook show leaves nothing off the table. Jada — with the assistance of her mother Adrienne Banfield - Norris and daughter Willow — discusses everything from sex to friendship, to mental health. Jada brought some of her therapeutic flavor to Megyn Kelly Today where she even talked about her own struggles with mental & emotional health. “ I was just sharing on my Instagram the other day of those times that I was in such deep despair that I ’ ve also thought about taking my life, ” she said.
